messages.content: It's hard not to feel let down by Westminster politics right now. Thirteen years of Labour rule have been a crushing let down for so many people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats propose to end decades of 'business as usual' in Westminster and clean up Westminster sleaze.
A focus on getting the economy moving again.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a choice between the Lib Dems and Labour. The Conservatives and SNP are out of the race in these areas.

issues.economy: We can get our economy moving again.
issues.governance: End decades of 'business as usual' in Westminster. Clean up Westminster sleaze.

images.caption: Nick Clegg Leader of the Liberal Democrats

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS - Don't forget, in many parts of Britain it's a choice between the Lib Dems and Labour. The Conservatives and SNP are out of the race in these areas.
